segments.text: Looking out the window, the garden seems so peaceful and well-maintained.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a stark contrast to the chaos happening inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The path and low bushes look inviting, like a nice place to relax.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the calmness just by looking at the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how different the inside and outside scenes are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window is open, letting in fresh air, but no one inside seems to appreciate it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman ever takes a break to enjoy the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The fence in the background adds a sense of security and boundary to the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit sad that the inside is so chaotic while the outside is so serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish they could bring some of that outdoor calmness into the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
